body.name: Meland Kids Camping Set with Tent - Toddler Toys for Boys with Campfire, Camping Toys for Kids Indoor Outdoor Pretend Play, Gift Idea for Boys Age 3,4,5,6 Year Old Birthday Christmas (Green)
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 21 hrs 31 mins
FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 21 hrs 31 mins
features: A MUST HAVE FOR LITTLE EXPLORERS ENJOY CAMPING ADVENTURE: Meland updated camping play set provides with 30 necessary camping accessories including a play pop-up tent, campfire with extendable stand, binocular, oil lamp, 2-in-1 pretend hatchet with knife,magnifier, pretend food toy, portable carrying lunch box,12pcs bugs toy set, 3-in-1 emergency whistle with functions of flashlights and compass and pretend camping utensils.

KIDS CAMPING TENT THAT SET IN SECOND: The size of camping tent fits 1-2 toddlers sitting in who have a secret base to enjoy their private place to play, read and think, which is perfect for indoor play set or a yard camping.
BATTERY-POWERED KIDS CAMPING GEAR TOYS: A true-to-life campfire with extendable stand and oil lantern can light up with 3 AA batteries (not included) and adjust the binoculars to see the world.

REINFORCES INDEPENDENCE AND DEEPEN BONDS: Pretend camping kit helps toddlers build a unique interest that specializes in outdoor activities or adventure experience. Besides, parents could teach your kids about camping skills through playing together to strength parent-child relationships.

ALL IN ONE PRETEND PLAY CAMP SET: Perfect for a pretend or a real outdoor camping trip that comes with an extra drawstring backpack to keep everything organized as well as a birthday gift outdoor toys for kids aged 3 4 5 6 7 8 year old.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Meland Kids Pretend Camping Toys with Everything Included A MUST HAVE FOR LITTLE EXPLORERS ENJOY CAMPING ADVENTUREKIDS CAMPING TENT THAT SET IN SECONDBATTERY-POWERED KIDS CAMPING GEAR TOYSREINFORCES INDEPENDENCE AND DEEPEN BONDSALL IN ONE PRETEND PLAY CAMP SET
Kids Pretend Play Campset with Campfire Meland new updated camping set features more camping gear tools - Extendable stand with lighted campfire to make this outdoor adventure more realistic.

A play tent that pops up and folds easily which doesn’t take much room so you could take it on a trip or playing in the house Battery-powered pretend camping gear and accessories develop kids’ imagination and hands on approach Pretend camping cookware and fake foods allow kids pretend to cook dinner and learn about survival An all in one kids’ camp set filled with plastic toy tools, tent, camping hat and backpack. Great gift for birthday and Xmas

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect camp play set
reviews.reviewText: My daughter loves this camp set. She loves the tent; it's small enough that it's not too big. Also, she loves the lantern light that displays a picture of a cute bug shining through the lens at the top, she sets the lantern each night. The plastic is not the highest quality and my daughter already broke one of the legs to the "log" tripod thing but overall its a good toy set for the price. I'm very happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was the fan favorite for ChristmasSo fun and cute. The tent was the best part with the lanterns. Really loved this

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got this set for my nephew. It’s definitely worth it. He loves it a lot, he’s 4 and he can fit in the tent. The toys are cheap material and he hasn’t broken anything yet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: gift for my 5yo nephew & he loves it 💙

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good value for the money. The flashlight/compass doesn’t work and you can’t change the battery. Other than that it was a perfect gift for a two year old with active imagination.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My toddler loves it!
reviews.reviewText: Got this for Christmas and my toddler loved it! Perfect for pretend camping. My son plays the magnifier toy All the time. Loves to pretend cook with the food items. The fire place light is my favorite lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice play camping set
reviews.reviewText: my grandson loved this camping set. He brought his pillow, blankie and iPad inside the tent and was so content.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute set!! 6 year old approved!!
reviews.reviewText: This is such a cute set!! It has the tent, a lantern, canteen, fake fire, etc and each piece is just as cute as the last! My son has been wanting to go camping for the first time and I figured this would be a great way to get him started and keep him safe! He will get the “wood” and the “axe” it came with and pretend to chop the wood up and start a fire. Has a little hat and bug set. Bug set has a few random bugs, magnifying glass, net, stuff like that and he enjoys playing with it by itself. Price point is great for this product, especially for everything you get! Highly recommend for any little camper!!! Would also be great as a gift!!
Buen producto, trae muchos accesorios para que los peques conozcan y exploren.
Le gusta hasta la fecha jugar con casita de campaña a mi hijo pero ya está deshilachada de la puerta desde poco después que la compre, no es muy resistente
